apiApplicationAlias.description: Alias to uniquely identify this API application.

scopes.description: Set of permissions for the application.

title.default: One or more validation errors occurred.

newApiApplicationAlias.description: New alias of the API application.

newDescription.description: Updated description of the API application.

newScopes.description: Updated scopes of the API Application.

collectionAlias.description: Alias to uniquely identify this collection.

environmentAlias.description: Alias to uniquely identify this environment.

ingestionFunctionAlias.description: Alias to uniquely identify this ingestion function.

script.description: Javascript body that contains the function.

persistedDocumentAlias.description: Alias to uniquely identify this persisted document.

description.description: Human-friendly description for this persisted document.
examples: Gets the names of software items

document.description: GraphQL body of the persisted document.

examples.description: Gets the names of software items

newPersistedDocumentAlias.description: New alias for the persisted document.

newDescription.description: New description for the persisted document.

newDocument.description: New GraphQL body for the persisted document.

typeSchemaAlias.description: Alias to uniquely identify this type schema.

newTypeSchemaAlias.description: New alias for the type schema.

newDescription.description: New description of the type schema.

apiKeyAlias.description: Alias to uniquely identify this API key.

description.description: Human-friendly description for this API key.
examples: This is my first API Key

projectAlias.description: The alias of your Umbraco Compose project.

environmentAliases.description: Aliases of environments for which the key will be valid.

scopes.description: The set of scopes for which the key will be valid.

validUntil.description: The time at which the key will expire and no longer be usable.

examples.description: This is my first API Key

description.description: New description for the API key.

environmentAliases.description: Aliases of environments for which the API key is valid.

scopes.description: New set of scopes for which the API key is valid.

webhookAlias.description: Alias to uniquely identify this webhook.

eventTypes.description: Only fire the hook if the event is one of these types.

typeSchemaAliases.description: Only fire the hook if the content is one of these types.

collectionAliases.description: Only fire the hook if the content is ingested into one of these collections.

customHeaders.description: Map of custom HTTP headers to send when firing the webhook.

collectionAliases.description: New set of collections for which the webhook should fire.

eventTypes.description: New set of events on which the webhook should fire.

newHeaders.description: New map of headers that will be sent with each trigger.

typeSchemaAliases.description: New set of type schema aliases for which the webhook should fire.

url.description: New URL for the webhook to hit.
